ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:0.5_0: 28. The training rule on giving robes
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.2_0: At that time the nun Thullanandā was giving monastic robes to actors, dancers, acrobats, magicians, and musicians, saying,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.3_0: he praises us to speak in praise!
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.4_0: Even though nun did not light cloaks ornaments, or by distributors of rice,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.5_0: “Venerables, please give a Dhamma talk to Thullanandā.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.6_0: Please give the venerables to make a statement.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.7_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.8_0: “How can Venerable Thullanandā give monastic robes to householders?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā does this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.12_0: “... How can the nun Thullanandā do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:1.15.1_0: ‘If a nun gives a monastic robe to a householder or a male wanderer or a female wanderer, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.1.8_0: any wanderer apart from Buddhist monks and novice monks.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.1.10_0: any nun who has never committed any trainee nun shouldn’t be given away by a novice nun.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.1.12_0: a mark has been made is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.1.13_0: If she gives it away, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.2.2_0: if she gives one to her mother or father;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc28:2.2.6_0: The eighth rule, the training rule on weavers, is finished.
